All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEvent
AddEvent Activity for creating new events within the Matata application.
AddEventUITest
Runs UI tests for the AddEvent activity using AndroidJUnit4.
AddEventUnitTest
Runs tests using the Robolectric test framework for Android.
Administrator
The Administrator class represents an administrator user within the Matata application.
AdminView
AdminView Activity provides an interface for administrative users within the Matata application.
ClearPendingListFragment
ClearPendingListFragment class is a DialogFragment that provides a dialog prompt to the user, asking if they want to cancel all entrants who haven't accepted the invitation yet.
ConfirmationFragment
ConfirmationFragment class is a DialogFragment that provides a dialog prompt to the user, asking if they want to discard their unsaved changes and go back.
DatePickerFragment
DatePickerFragment is a DialogFragment that displays a date picker dialog to allow users to select a date.
DatePickerListener
DatePickerListener is an interface that provides a callback for handling date selections in the DatePickerFragment.
Entrant
Entrant class represents an individual entrant with personal information including name, phone number, and email.
EntrantAdapter
EntrantAdapter is a RecyclerView adapter that binds a list of Entrant objects to views displayed in a RecyclerView.
EntrantAdapter.EntrantViewHolder
EntrantViewHolder is a view holder for Entrant items in the RecyclerView.
Event
Event class represents an event with details such as title, date, time, location, description, capacity, event ID, organizer ID, and a waitlist limit.
EventAdapter
EventAdapter is a RecyclerView adapter that binds a list of Event objects to views displayed in a RecyclerView.
EventAdapter.EventViewHolder
EventViewHolder is a view holder for Event items in the RecyclerView.
EventDetailActivity
EventDetailActivity displays the details of a selected event and allows users to join or withdraw from the event's waitlist.
EventDraw
EventDraw activity manages the draw process for an event, allowing the organizer to randomly select entrants from a waitlist.
EventDrawTest
 
EventHistory
EventHistory activity displays a list of past events created by the user, allowing them to view details of each event.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
Facility
Facility class represents a facility with a name and description.
FacilityActivity
FacilityActivity allows users to enter and save facility information, such as name, address, capacity, contact, and more.
FacilityInfoDialogFragment
FacilityInfoDialogFragment displays facility information in a dialog fragment.
FacilityPicActivity
FacilityPicActivity allows the user to view, select, upload, and delete a profile picture.
MainActivity
MainActivity serves as the main hub of the app, displaying available events in a RecyclerView, allowing users to navigate to different sections, and setting up notifications for waitlist updates.
MainActivityTest
Runs instrumentation tests for the MainActivity using AndroidJUnit4.
Notification
Notification class manages the setup and sending of notifications within the application.
Organizer
Organizer class represents an organizer user with the ability to manage a facility.
ProfileActivity
ProfileActivity manages the user's profile, allowing them to edit personal information, view and update profile images, and manage facility data if they are an organizer.
ProfileActivityTest
Runs instrumentation tests for the ProfileActivity using AndroidJUnit4.
ProfilePicActivity
ProfilePicActivity allows the user to view, select, upload, and delete a profile picture.
ProfilePicActivityTest
Runs instrumentation tests for the ProfilePicActivity using AndroidJUnit4.
ProfileUnitTest
Runs tests using the Robolectric test framework for Android.
QR_camera
QR_camera class provides functionality for scanning QR codes using the device's camera.
QR_displayFragment
QR_displayFragment displays a QR code and provides an option to save it as a PNG file.
QR_displayListener
QR_displayListener is an interface for handling data read from a QR code.
ScanQRUITest
 
ShadowSystemClock
Shadow implementation of the SystemClock class.
SignUpSheet
SignUpSheet class handles the creation of a sign-up form for event attendees.
TimePickerFragment
TimePickerFragment displays a time picker dialog that allows users to select a time.
TimePickerListener
TimePickerListener is an interface that provides a callback for when a time is selected from a TimePickerFragment.
User
The User class serves as a superclass for user-related roles, such as Entrant and Organizer.
ViewEvent
The ViewEvent class represents the activity to view details of a specific event.
ViewEventUnitTest
Runs tests for the ViewEvent activity using Robolectric.
